com.upsight.android.googlepushservices

Interface UpsightPushNotificationBuilderFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UpsightPushNotificationBuilderFactory.Default

    public interface UpsightPushNotificationBuilderFactory
    This interface is optionally implemented to customize how Push Notifications will be presented. Implementations must be referred to in the Android Manifest as meta-data with android:name="com.upsight.notification_builder_factory".

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  UpsightPushNotificationBuilderFactory.Default
      Default implementation of UpsightPushNotificationBuilderFactory.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      NotificationCompat.Builder getNotificationBuilder(UpsightContext upsight, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String message, java.lang.String imageUrl, java.lang.String channelId, int priority)
      A method to customize the appearance of Push Notifications by allowing the application to provide a customized android.support.v4.app.NotificationCompat.Builder that the Upsight SDK can use for presenting Push Notifications when messages arrive.

    • Method Detail

      • getNotificationBuilder

        NotificationCompat.Builder getNotificationBuilder(UpsightContext upsight,
                                                  java.lang.String title,
                                                  java.lang.String message,
                                                  java.lang.String imageUrl,
                                                  java.lang.String channelId,
                                                  int priority)
        A method to customize the appearance of Push Notifications by allowing the application to provide a customized android.support.v4.app.NotificationCompat.Builder that the Upsight SDK can use for presenting Push Notifications when messages arrive.

        Your implementation is responsible for setting the title, message, icon, and other attributes.

        After the Builder is returned, the Upsight SDK will always set auto-cancel flag to true, and will override the associated PendingIntent.

        Parameters:
        upsight - The UpsightContext passed in for convenience.
        title - The title that the Push Notification will display.
        message - The message that the Push Notification will display.
        imageUrl - The image URL for NotificationCompat.BigPictureStyle if available.
        channelId - The notification channel to send the message to.
        priority - The priority of the notification. Must be one of the priority constants defined by NotificationCompat. Acceptable values range from NotificationCompat#PRIORITY_MIN (-2) to NotificationCompat#PRIORITY_MAX (2).
        Returns:
        The android.support.v4.app.NotificationCompat.Builder that the Upsight SDK will use to display the Push Notification.
